website_summaries.verdict: These are an ultra lightweight water shoe with a nice anti-slip sole, comfortable and designed to fit both men and women.
pros: Multisport shoes ideal for swimming, kayaking, windsurfing, surfing, poolside, sailing, and other activities
Simple and clean ergonomic design, more of a sock with a sturdier sole than a shoe feel
These have some of the widest varieties of sizes, styles, and colors of all models we reviewed
cons: Ideal for water-based activity – may not be sturdy enough for major activities like hiking or long walks
Insole can bunch up inside the shoe

customer_reviews.title: Insoles Slide Back
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they are so comfortable, it feels like I’m barefoot. Only complaint is that the insoles keep sliding and bunching up in the back. I don’t know if I ordered a size too large, or what. I like them enough though that I’m going to order another pair a size smaller, just to see if that’s the problem. I hope it is because I really want to love these shoes. If it weren’t for the insoles sliding I would order one in every color!
customer_reviews.author: MRS L

customer_reviews.title: Uberly comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: First pair of water shoes, best experience ever. Took it to legoland with the kids, wore it in water and land, never once felt it slipping off. Super, comfortable for walking too. I wore it for 9 hours. For those who complained about it slipping, simply get a half a size smaller. I had no issues. Will be buying more. I got the plain black ones, and they looked pretty cool. Had compliments on them too.
customer_reviews.author: Lani37

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and perfect for beach/swimming pool use! I used them inside of some short fins while in Florida and they made perfect socks for the fins. Also great because the bottoms are actually like the bottom of real shoes so they were awesome for walking around on the shells and cement walking back to my car!
customer_reviews.author: Jammas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish, not good for swimming
customer_reviews.text: I was half expecting this product to be a flop, because so many people had negative things to say about the inside pad shifting around. What I found was that, yes, the pad can shift around, but only if you’re doing something athletic with them. If you wear them for lounging by the pool or light boating activities, they work perfectly fine. The reason I wasn’t completely satisfied with this product is because it’s almost impossible to swim with them on. If you kick your foot once in submerged water, you’re almost sure to lose a shoe. Keep that in mind if swimming with shoes on is important to you.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Runs Big
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and look for the price but I would recommend going down a size. I’m a Women’s 7.5 and I ordered the size Medium that fits a Women’s 7.5-8.5 and it was way too big. There was a huge gap of space towards the back of the foot. I returned and ordered a small size that fits a Women’s 5.5-6.5 and it fit a lot better and snug. Keep in mind they do stretch so sizing down would be your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT shoes!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE SHOES! They are super comfy, breathable, and extremely light weight. Firm enough to wear every day but thin enough to swim in. I am going to order a few more pairs of these because I like them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: Cute, chic and effective enough
customer_reviews.text: Feel like really thick socks made from wetsuit material with a bottom that's somewhere between slippers & sneakers in hardness. They were a little tight around the ankle but not intolerable. The bottom was hard enough for me to walk on rocks but still so soft that big rocks hurt a little bit. They kept me for feeling anything that would freak me out in the water. But allowed a lot of sand in and was really hard to rinse out. I'm overall satisfied & would probably order again if I needed new water shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kimaya

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight but fabric not sturdy enough for me.
customer_reviews.text: These feel great on and are perfect for exercising in the pool and the walk there over hot pavement. Work great at the beach. Very lightweight and comfortable and no sand in shoes. Soles not thick enough to walk over very rough surfaces but perfect for my needs. Alas, I can see that my big toe is starting to poke a hole in the top even though I cut my nails very short. They are snug on land and just slightly loose in the water so I can’t go up a size. Need to find some with tougher material at the toe.
customer_reviews.author: AustinPhotog

customer_reviews.title: Beach shoes, not just for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these shoes, which I use for Aqua Zumba. They fit perfectly, are lightweight and keep my feet from sliding on the floor of the pool. I recommended them to two other participants, who also love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the multicolor and the black. These shoes were perfect for kayaking as we had to walk into the water to launch our boat. Our feet were protected and the bottoms of these shoes have a nice tread for some grip. When we got home, we just dunked them in a soapy bucket and hosed them off. The inserts come out, so they can easily air dry by the next day. The fit was true to size. My husband and I were both very happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jreview

customer_reviews.title: Prison issue slippers
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Wore them once and within 5 minutes of being used holes had formed in the front where my (cut the night before) toenails had gone through the fabric. Within 2 hours the entire front part was open and had rendered them absolutely useless and had to throw them out. My friends quickly gave them the nickname of "prison issue slippers".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good water shoe/ Zipper pocket great idea, not built well enough though
customer_reviews.text: I use the at the lake when paddle boarding and at the pool when doing aerobics. They were great at a hot water park too! The were fine to protect my feet and I did not slip or have a hard time getting them on or off. They also stayed on well. They did not cut off my circulation and provided adequate traction. I would not use these for hiking or playing in rocky mountain streams, as they do not offer enough traction or protection for me. The flaw was the zipper pocket broke after the first time wearing them without anything in them. I would probably try again as maybe I got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Cat

customer_reviews.title: Stylish water shoes
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Everyone loved this style. I bought the all black water shoes and definitely came in handy. The bottom sole is pretty good, they didn’t tear on my trip. However the inside sole of the shoes came apart after 1 day of use (it was really during the 1 day of use). So although I am sad they only lasted one good day since the inside came out, it is a cute shoe, not very slip resistance but they are good water shoes. If you want long term shoes, these are not the ones. I only recommend for small/short trips.
customer_reviews.author: JSanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great to use while doing water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: Just the right fit. Great to use while doing water aerobics.
customer_reviews.author: johncup

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to get these to use as minimalist shoes rather than on a boat or at the beach. They are very comfortable, but I did remove the insoles because they were just slipping around inside the shoe. I like how they look, though my honest 5 year old says they look like I’m wearing just socks outside and look weird. They do not have a wide footbed.
customer_reviews.author: A Neub

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough
customer_reviews.text: Ok, at first I loved these water shoes. The color and style and fit were awesome, so no issues there. After wearing them only for a few hours in water, the inner lining started to peel back and I was left for the rest of my trip walking in shoes with a liner that had all but completely fallen out. I ended up throwing them away after our trip and bought a pair from another company. Also the top of the shoe is very thin, so if you are near rocks and hit your toe or top of your foot, it hurts REALLY bad. Very bendy and not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kate R

customer_reviews.title: They seem durable enough. I walked around my house ...
customer_reviews.text: They seem durable enough. I walked around my house in them for a little while and they didn't overheat my feet, or irritate them. Mine were a little small, but that doesn't seem to be a problem for walking on the beach in them. I'm just excited to not have little cuts and raw feet from the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable water shoes ive ever found
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are so comfortable and light weight. I bought four pairs, one for my daughter, one for me (I had to send two of those back because they were to small) went up a size and they seem a bit big I have a lot of room in my heel area. But I love them, I'm unsure if I'm supposed to take the insert out because it moves around while I'm walking but I'm fine with or without it. LOVE THESE WATER SHOES!!!!! Considering I have large feet for a women and is extremely flat footed I'd say you can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, came apart within an hour of wear
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of these for my family to wear on our day at a waterpark, and within an hour of wearing they literally started falling apart. My husbands shoes got holes on the top by his toes. All three of our insoles came apart, sliding out the back of the shoes when walking, and the blue padding under the insoles came out. These are cheaply made and didn't even last a few hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach and water parks!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these for my honeymoon cruise! We wore them around the water park at Atlantis in the Bahamas and on the beach at the cruise line’s private island. So comfortable (and I have wide feet!). They were also just right around the ankles and didn’t cut off any circulation or anything. Minor slippage of the inside sole, but I was usually able to get it back in place by just moving my foot around. Would take these again hands down. A cruise must-have.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Protects your feet - great after small fix.
customer_reviews.text: Love these water shoes. They’re more like water socks with a rubber sole but they are surprisingly comfy and durable. I did have an issue with the interior of one of the shoes; the material was not cut correctly and a sharp piece was sticking out from the side where the sole meets the base of the sock. I remedied by cutting off rough material and putting a few stitches in to reinforce (I needed for a trip next day and had no time to exchange). After my fix, they were great and I wore for several days outdoors boating.
customer_reviews.author: ValB

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart the very first use. All 3 pairs we bought!
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart the very first use: and we bought 3 pairs, so it wasn't a fluke or just a bad pair. All of them did the same thing. Very bad quality. I didn't expect them to be top notch for the price, but certainly get more than one sad use. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to slip on, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually wear shoes around the house and we recently bought a rowing machine that is easier to use if one is wearing shoes. Well I’m to lazy to run upstairs, put on socks and shoes and go back downstairs to use the rower. I got these to slip on to give me some comfort while rowing and these fit the bill. Easy to slip on, fit is good and they are cute to wear just walking around the house. I got the size 6 and they fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Noodlehead

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well and like walking barefoot
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how well these will do in the summer time for my feet being cool enough but they are what I wanted which is to feel like I'm barefoot but to have a sole on the shoe. I have a long narrow foot and the 9/1/2-10 1/2 fits perfectly. I don't feel like my feet are sliding around inside them which was what I was afraid of and the elastic over the instep isn't too tight. The width is fine. If someone's foot is wide and thick I don't know how well these would do but you could try.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome water shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible water shoes. It's comfy and protects my feet at the beach. I was impressed that no tiny rocks was able to get into my feet. So far so good. I even got my wife and 19 month old son a pair as well and they loved it. Would buy again when my son out grows them.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These are not as sturdy as I thought they would be. The shape is also a bit awkward. They are comfortable though. I have not yet worn them in the river (which is what I purchased them for). The design started to come off the toe within hours of wearing them in the house (which is all I have done). At this point I pretty much wear them like house shoes. They are thin and comfortable to wear around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Redsun131

customer_reviews.title: They are excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves these! She has very fragile and sensitive souls and she can't be barefoot and she loves to be barefoot, especially in water. She hasn't tried them in water yet but whe loves watering her plants and feeling the water on her feet. I bought some for me too and I tried them out in a river (the sand can be like sand paper rubbing on my feet) and they were excellent. The sand didn't get in, it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Posada

customer_reviews.title: Holes on top material
customer_reviews.text: Not good! Took them on a trip and wore them for a day. Got holes on the top of my toes had to throw them out. The fit was good and the soles were good and non-slip but the top part did not hold up on either shoe. I was totally disappointed and thought of sending them back for a refund but ended up throwing them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia D.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect to wear around the house, AAA+ for fit and function.
customer_reviews.text: These are a little big, but when my feet swell up at the end of the day, I can keep them on. They help me keep my balance because I can feel where I'm walking. Non-slip soles keep my feet from slipping on linoleum and tile, and they are sturdy enough to wear outside to take out the trash and wear in the garage or on the patio. I will definitely buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Love these water shoes! Cool patterns and colors but they do run a little small. I'm a 7.5-8 womens and these said would fit up to 8.5. They stretch so I can wear them but toe was right at end and knew they would wear quickly so passed them on to my daughter and bought another pair for myself. My advice is to go one size up for comfort. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jahneezomah

customer_reviews.title: Big feet
customer_reviews.text: I got the biggest size 13-14 in women's. I am 6'2 and wear 13 or 11.5 in men's and these were just a little too small still! Not hugely and I'm sure they will stretch but was kinda disappointed they weren't bigger. It's hard enough to find cute shoes for a young lady with Sasquatch sized feet. Other than that so far they are comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklin carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Water/Aerobics/Zumba/Yoga Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is a water shoe but who said it has to be used for that? This shoe has versatility. Use it for Aerobics or Zumba classes. What about Yoga classes? It is so light weight and fits true to size (purchased actual shoe size). Then head off to your Water Aerobics class. I purchased a couple pairs so there is a pair in each bag and I don’t have to go looking for them before heading off to class.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great Simple Water Adventure Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes for a white water rafting weekend. They stayed on during the whole trip, including swimming, walking around camp, and a 40ft jump into the water. They are true to size; I am a 6.5 and the 6/7 size fit me perfectly. They look surprisingly good for such an inexpensive shoe, and they provided good protection from the ground without adding bulk or weight. The only negative is that my ID would not fit into the zippered pocket, but that's more because I have tiny feet than because the design is flawed. Overall, incredibly happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Lesperance

customer_reviews.title: Great for dirty waters with rocks and other unknown items.
customer_reviews.text: I love to go floating down the river but it's extremely rocky which cut up my feet badly the year before. I wanted something good and I bought these. They stayed on through the rough waters and I could step on the bottom of the river and not hurt my feet. I usually wear size 6 shoes and they fit perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Shoe and pocket too small! Bad advertising!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9.5-10.5 because I wear a size 10 hoping I would have a good fit. Not the case. These really run small. I purchased these mainly for the little storage pocket. As you can see, a credit card does NOT fit. There’s room for a key, maybe some string and if you lose a tooth while in the water you could put it in there for safe keeping. That’s about it!
customer_reviews.author: AMerten

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable BUT NOT durable.
customer_reviews.text: Although I loved these when I tried them on but I never wore them until we went on vacation. I walked 5 miles a day for 2 days; on the 3rd day an inside seam started to separate and rubbed my foot to where I couldn’t wear them for the rest of our trip. So if you plan to do a lot of walking; I would not recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The pocket was no where big enough to put a credit card in.. it's about half the size of a credit card.. not really sure what you could fit In there.. if u really want water shoes with pockets these are not the shoes other than that they were fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way better than your standard swim show.
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I LOVE these. And I hate swim shoes. These fit snugly like a sock which keep sand out! It’s not perfect some sand can get in but not like a normal swim shoe. The rubber sole is also nice. I was able to walk through our yard and I to the water to launch our jet skis with no issue. And the sailing ship rainbow pattern is just cool!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable....very... and cute.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these water shoes... that I wear all the time. Outdoors, indoors...not shopping... but... ?? I do not do well with real shoes unless necessary...as I am old. Two of my daughters got some as a gift after trying mine. We "ladies" like to "feel" what we are walking on, AND they wash nicely and dry quickly. HUGS.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M. Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durable, fit women's 10 (M) perfectly (short round foot), naturally dries fast (no dryer),removable insets, good grip in water and packs well. Great colors, hold up well in chlorine and daily wash. LOVE THESE SHOES; 2ND pair. Fast, arrived in 3 days. I use these in water aerobics. Some exercises in deep water I use pool wall-NON SLIP, EXCELLENT GRIP, yet I walk easily in pool. Durable, wash 4 times a week, due to chlorine. First pair 6 months old in great shape. Women's 10 (M) short round foot fits perfectly, removable insole-just right due to stroke (cushioned, but need to feel close to ground for balance). LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: not suitable for coral
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms are too lightweight so while you can wear these in fins (assuming they are high enough so the plastic fin doesnt rub on your ankle) the bottom is not durable enough to walk on coral (which you shouldnt be doing) but I mean walking in water where you may potentially step on a coral.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Held up well good value
customer_reviews.text: Used these to do some light hiking and creek swimming in Sedona az. They were great. Held up fine in and out of the water and walking through the sand dirt and climbing over the rocks. Wish they gave more support but overall a great water shoe for the price. Fit nicely no rough spots and no blisters!
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Best water shoes, hands down
customer_reviews.text: These are the first pair of water shoes I've ever owned that stayed firmly on my feet in the water. The soles are legit af, I walked out into the rock bottomed lake shores in these while carrying my geriatric dog for hydrotherapy time and never slipped on the slick rocks. They're comfortable enough to walk around in for hours at a time and don't need to be taken off and dumped out like old water shoes. Plus, super cute with that sleek design. In short, would def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Fit is SUPER WEIRD!!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all the heel area is cut in the weirdest way. They’re cut at an angle so there’s this weird part sticking out behind ur heel. Also they’re REALLY wide in the front. I’m normally a size 6 and ordered size “5.5-6.5” and they’re a whole index finger too wide for my foot. Will absolutely be returning!!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Run small, fabric seems to be weak, but rubber soles seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 9 1/2 shoe so I ordered the women's 9.5 - 10.5. My toe comes right to the edge of the toe box. If you wear a 10 or larger, these will probably be too small. I wore them over the weekend to a beach with bigger rocks on the bottom. They worked great for keeping my feet from getting sore,but after one use, the fabric is already showing wear. The rubber soles held up fine. For the price, I guess if I get a season's use out of them, I'll be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Danita1973

customer_reviews.title: too short
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pair, I like the design of these but there is no room at the tip like the other pair so there is a small hole after I wore them one time for 1/2 hour..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: These were such a life saver when I was out on a summer science camp on Catalina Island! I wore these as shoes to walk everywhere--and I was able to safely wear them into the ocean when I snorkeled and swam--they did NOT weight me down. They were very fitting to my feet and were comfortable. Cleaning them was simple--lots of sand got in them--didn't bother me too much when I was out playing but after they dried out--it would be a little annoying. Simple fix though. Took them off. I love these and I will keep them as long as they last!
customer_reviews.author: Rayven

customer_reviews.title: Try these!! Very happy with my order!
customer_reviews.text: I looked and looked at different water shoes and was hesitant to buy these after reading some of the reviews. But I liked the price, the print, and style. I am pleasantly surprised so far after wearing on vacation. I don't know how long they'll last as I find most water shoes are not long lasting and get brittle. But so far so good!!! Definitely would buy again. I think they're true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Shea Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Look good. Nice material. But a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute. The material is high quality. But next time I'll order a larger size. I had to cut the sides since they were a little too small. I was afraid it would cause the material to begin unraveling since I had to cut through seams. But that hasn't happened at all. It seems like these will last for a long time. And they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad we had them for my son to use at ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit and did the job as far as being able to use them at the beach. But after 3 days of use, they were trashed. So I’m mixed about them. I’m glad we had them for my son to use at the beach, but they aren’t good for another trip. The inserts started falling out and scrunting up and being loose so we threw them away when we got home.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I looooove these!! They're super comfortable, fit my feet perfectly, and they're so cute. I don't too much care for regular shoes, so I use these when I'm running errands. They feel like wearing shoes but are much more lightweight and more comfortable in my opinion. I ordered the plain black ones, but I'm about to order more!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: fit great
customer_reviews.text: Wore these off the ship in Labradee walked to the beach spent time in the water then walked back to the ship. They were a perfect fit and felt good on my feet. I washed them and let them air dry look like they have never been worn. Ready for the next cruise.....
customer_reviews.author: Clara Agro

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for harsher terrains
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these for when my husband and I went to the river, we love the river but the rocks can sometimes be harsh on bare feet. These stayed on well enough but they are so thin on the bottom that it didn’t make much of a difference with the rocks. Also I got maybe 2 trips to the river out of them before one of them had a hole in the toe area that kept getting bigger as the day progressed. So over all not very durable. Maybe if you plan to be in an easier terrain like a pool.
customer_reviews.author: Sarai Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Just as the description says!
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I could actually use these at the beach. They are perfect! I walked on the sand and nothing got inside. I walked in the water with them on and my feet did not slip or slide around at all. They are exactly what you need if you are in and out of the water and sand and need protection for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 women's shoe and ordered the 9.5-10.5 size expecting them to be large. They are elastic so they formed to my foot well with some room to give. My foot fits flat on the sole perfectly. If you have a shoe size larger than a 9, your toes might hang over the sole a bit, but if you don't mind that, it'll be a secure fit. They are a bit loose in the water but haven't come off my foot yet.
customer_reviews.author: Aimer

customer_reviews.title: Best pool shoe purchase in years!!️
customer_reviews.text: Great pool shoe for water aerobics Fit is comfortable and there is no tightness along the top of the foot. Dry quickly and the color (hot pink) is a standout at the pool👍
customer_reviews.author: Catherine P

customer_reviews.title: Good product , helps you to be comfortable when you walked in the sea water
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! I used it on the second day of summer when it’s Father’s Day , me and my family went to the beach , oh gosh it’s really worth it that I buy this , the water was really cold ,this product helps me not to be so cold with the water , and also helps me to walk good In the beach ! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Jgeonzon37

customer_reviews.title: but these shoes exceeded my expectations they are amazing i figured i just needed water shoes for at ...
customer_reviews.text: lets start off with i NEVER leave reviews, but these shoes exceeded my expectations they are amazing i figured i just needed water shoes for at least a day, i used them the whole week while on vacation they survived all my river trekking and rock climbing i love them they are amazing, i totally recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: crystal mejia

customer_reviews.title: Weird Fit in Back
customer_reviews.text: So... There's extra fabric hanging out by the heel. The heel fits fine otherwise. It's just a reverse elf shoe. I'm going to wear these on the boat anyway. The sole is pretty thin. These are for water use, but not rocky areas or walking to water.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use these for water aquacise. They are very comfortable and don't slip at all. I only just started using them so can't answer about durability but they are very well constructed and I see no reason why they shouldn't last for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: helenvan

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE BEST QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality but for the price they are worth it. They will not last you for ever but if it’s just a week on the beach they will suffice. They look very cute but they kind of start losing their shape after a couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Hills

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1 week but not durable, can’t wash.
customer_reviews.text: Light, stylish and served purpose for 1 trip to keys but I bought 4 and they at fell apart when I wash them. I wore mine entire trip every day and they had to be thrown away. Other 3 pair just look ruff and material coming off shoe where plastic meets material. Other water shoes I have bought wash fine, they just have to be sun dried due to elastic material.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu S.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved these and have not worn them to the water yet but they are very comfortable and I dont think I will ever go back to regular water shoes! I've literally just been walking around the house in them. I would size up. I'm a size 9 which wasn't a option and I had read that you should size up so I did and got the 9.5-10.5 and they fit perfect. I'll update after I wear them to the water park.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable -
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great got for wearing at a theme park in a lazy river and wave pool so i didnt have to go barefoot across the water part of the park with out shoes. Only down fall is that the fabric is weak and about an hour in my big toe was coming out the top. I believe this may have just been a flaw in the pair i got
customer_reviews.author: sgottlob

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe but disappointed at the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these water shoes a lot. They are true to size and very comfortable. The only problem I have is when using them for the third time, I noticed little rips on both shoes at the toe part. This is extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Erigan26

customer_reviews.title: Size chart NOT accurate
customer_reviews.text: Was.looking for a sturdy closed water shoe not like exactly like keen but these bottom would tear in no time in the lake. Style print was adorable. But mostly the sizing was not my normal size (8) toes hung over on the inside and the heel portion was "bunchy" and not snug around the heel. Unfortunately they are going back.
customer_reviews.author: TamKic

customer_reviews.title: Snug but cute
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for camping. Mainly for wearing in the camp shower and going canoeing. They are excellent for the price. There is a removable insole if you want to make them roomier. They are very thin-soled though, even with the insole in. They are also quite snug, as they are meant to be, but you should probably round up the size when purchasing rather than round down. They also take up next to no room in a backpack or suitcase which is pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Nice water shoes
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't wear water shoes when I go swimming but these were so pretty and on sale so I took a chance and bought them. Thankfully I did because I had an accident in the pool and the shoes really protected my feet from getting scraped up. The soles provide enough protection without being clunky. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Ambush

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These fit just as I like for water shoes. They meet may expectation for functionality, but exceed them for comfort and style. They are the most comfortable water shoes I've ever owned and very stylish. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ceridwen

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the picture, comfortable and portable
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I like to change into flat, flexible shoes for my lunchtime workout. I can carry them flat in a plastic bag in my purse, and have them handy for the workout. If I wear heels and want to walk in flat shoes at lunch, these are great for that, too. Highly portable, fit comfortably, and lots of nice patterns to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kondo

customer_reviews.title: Wear out quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an aquatics class and within less than 3 months the tips of these shoes are wearing out. I am wearing them until they actually create a hole and then I plan to switch to Ryka Aqua 4 shoes.
customer_reviews.author: te

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and handy
customer_reviews.text: Wore these on my recent cruise, bought a different pair for each of us. Good material... on one of stops... Belize... another lady was wearing these and we just looked at it each other and said Amazon lol. Very good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Wen V.

customer_reviews.title: Dries Really Fast
customer_reviews.text: I could have ordered a smaller size, but it works really well in the pool. My previous water shoes had ripped and these are far better than those ones. They dry really fast, they are very comfortable. They don't quite seem to have the same traction as my other shoes, but more than enough.
customer_reviews.author: Fatma Alici

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I wish I would have know the sizing was a bit small, I would have ordered a size up. Regardless, they are perfect for beach, water, kayaking, etc. They are so lightweight and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Used them for the first time since I received them. They were comfortable and they looked nice. The ONLY bad thing.... it made me realize I have one foot bigger than the other. It felt more snug on my left foot. Hahaha That's a personal problem. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Some pairs are not tru to size
customer_reviews.text: There is no way I can wear this shoe. Toe box is small but the legnth is all wrong. I ordered 2 pairs of the "love" water shoes from this seller and they fit true to size. I will be sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Pool / shower/ sauna perfect
customer_reviews.text: The perfect shower gym shoe, perfect for around swimming pool slick areas! They do fit snug but i prefer that especially when . They get wet! No foot fungus for me! Solid material!!! No compensation given or offered for my review .
customer_reviews.author: Cindee and Mike Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy and excellent to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely 💯 love these. I have neuropathy in my feet and can't walk barefoot like I use to. These are wonderful, lightweight and very comfortable. I have since bought 2 more pair for variety. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Order up a size!
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a men's size 7, but when we received the men's size 6.5 to 7.5 water shoes, his toes were crammed into it. Fortunately, it fit me (a women's 6.5) perfectly. So order up a size! Seems great otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Bekakitty

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight house shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am wearing these as house shoes. I wanted something lightweight for summer that I could walk outside in and these fit the bill. So far they are just what I was looking for. I’ll probably buy some additional pairs!
customer_reviews.author: EDot

customer_reviews.title: Wearing thin with minimal use
customer_reviews.text: I loved these at first. They fit good and look good. They are so lightweight that I forgot I had them on. Although after only 10 times that I wore them (I'm 57, it wasn't aggressive use) they have worn through across the toes (no my toenails aren't too long :) I'm disappointed that they won't last thru the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs big!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes would be the best however they run big. They didn’t carry a size smaller so I can’t get a pair to fit perfectly. Love the looks and feel but just doesn’t fit right. Leaves a gap about 1/2 inch in back!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take on vacation with me (which I haven't gone yet). I tried them on at home first and they fit really well. Soft materiel and good strong sole. They feel like you're wearing slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Hanscome

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money. Bought two pairs of these for vacation along mountain stream and both pairs developed holes in where the big toe is after just 4 days. Into the garbage they went. Cheaply made and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: SF Journo

customer_reviews.title: Cute functional water shoe
customer_reviews.text: ...but very short in length. I wear a woman's size ten and the size covered up to woman's shoe size 10.5 but it was too short to be comfortable and you want water shoes to fit snuggly so they do not come off in the water.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Cute but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I gave to my sister ..I am a true women's 9 and they run very small
customer_reviews.author: Sunsets ahead......

customer_reviews.title: This was a great buy! Used it when we were to a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! Used it when we were to a beach filled with sea shells. I was looking at other people walking barefoot and in pain, and I kept thanking my lucky stars that we bought these before hand and brought them.
customer_reviews.author: Marnie Reyes

customer_reviews.title: good grippy soles, quick dry
customer_reviews.text: These inexpensive water socks are great for rocky beaches or streams, with enough tread to help you keep your grip when climbing too. My daughter is a outdoor camp counselor in the summer and wears them all the time when the kids are in the stream. they dry fast, too! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Stylish water shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish. Iʻv not used it to the beach yet. My feet just made it. The little pocket was too small to hold a credit card. However one key as the picture shows or some cash would fit. I Luv that there are no holes On the bottom of the soles to catch little pebbles.
customer_reviews.author: nani H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Ohio beaches
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for the beach. We have a sand and pebble beach off of Lake Erie. It's too hard to walk in flip flops or bare feet. These were perfect. I did not get any sand in them and they protected my feet. The sizing is weird. I wear a ladies 9. I ordered the large and my toes are right at the end. They're still comfortable tho. My sister ordered the xl for a ladies size 10 and the were too big. I intend to purchase another pair in the large. The price is excellent for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect water/yoga shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these water/yoga shoes. They fit perfectly. They have a very flexible rubber sole. You can still feel the floor. The came in very nice reusable slide top bags which is great for transporting them in your bag when they're wet. Very satisfied. Will certainly buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my swim shoes. I ordered a medium because I wear a size 8 US (UK 5.5).I wore them to the beach to protect my feet from the hot sand and rocks in the water and the rubber bottom did just that. I did end up with sand in my shoes but it was super easy to clean (flip inside out rinse and allow to air dry) great deal, you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Kita Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I never used this type of footwear before, and only bought them because it was required at a water park I was going to. I was pleasantly surprised at the comfort of them. They were slightly big, but not so much that they could come off. Maybe I'm just not sure what they should feel like. Anyway, I'm happy I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney LaRhette

customer_reviews.title: Women size 7
customer_reviews.text: Coolest water shoes EVER! I live 5 miles from the beach, so I’ve never needed water shoes and make fun of anyone that shows up to the beach in them. We recently were invited on a tubing trip in a river and it was suggested we bring water shoes. Well these did the trick! Super thin and sleek, tons of cute styles to choose from! I’m a woman’s 7 in shoes and there was no 7 option so i went with the 5-6.5 option and they fit, a little tight but not uncomfortable, actually helped so the water didn’t slosh around in them. 100% super happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine and look cool
customer_reviews.text: We got this pair and another one for women , both felt nice , were easy to put on , no rips , they dried out fast and didn’t have any weird smell after using them all day at the beach for 4 days in a row . We are happy with these shoes .
customer_reviews.author: The Williams family

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried after reading the reviews, but am happy with this purchase. I have VERY small feet and narrow ankles (often making finding shoes a challenge). These are just right. Snug, but not too tight. That said, I think for people with wider feet/thicker ankles, etc. fit might be a challenge. The ankle hole is quite small and there is a bit of the sole that sticks out in the back. Overall, I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: These are very pretty I love the vibrant colors and there pretty comfortable ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty I love the vibrant colors and there pretty comfortable my only concern is the sole of the shoe is not as long as my foot size I wear a size 9 sometimes nine and a half and my toe hangs over and I purchased a 9 and 1/2 10 size
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Nash

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: They were nicely made, very cute, color was cute, I wear a 7 adn I ordered a 7.5-8 womens and I could get them on but they were too small. After wearing a bit they hurt my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for an indoor waterpark. We tore them up with the concrete ground. Not recommended to make it past a day or 2 if this is the reason you are buying. I'm sure these would be more suitable for a beach or a pool in general, not a waterpark. Overall very comfortable tho. Was very thankful for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOOOOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting much since the price is so affordable but I got them yesterday & wore them for several hours & I was extremely impressed! Just purchased a pint pair today :) I’ve had 14 leg surgeries so I don’t know how they’ll hold up to my aches & pains but love em so far. BUY & TRY!
customer_reviews.author: J M Smooth

product_meta.title: JIASUQI Summer Outdoor Beach Swim Aqua Water Shoes Socks for Women Men
feature_bullets: PERFECT MATERIAL: Ultra Light Weight Stretchy Material allows user to easily put on and take off, to provide you with a comfortable feeling.
ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT & ANTI SLIP SOLE:Unique Sole with non-slip effective to maximally protects your feet.
COMFORTABLE & FIT: Breathable upper material, non-slip soles and smooth neck design, to prevent wearing chafing, make you more comfortable and flexible.
VARIOUS SIZE AVAILABLE: From XS to XXXL for Women and Men.( For the length, Please Refer to Product Description).
IDEAL FOR ANY ACTIVITY: Perfect for beach, swimming, surf, pool, sailing, boating, kayaking, windsurfing, yoga and other any activity.
